title: Why doesnt my boards profile change when I change my name ingame?
body: I recently changed my name in league of legends, but my boards name is still the old name, and the profile has a ? picture instead of the Vel'Koz icon I use.

replies.body:
It looks like your Boards and Summoner Profiles had fallen out of sync, but it looks like they caught up and things look good again.

Let me know if you have any questions.
